articles.title: Marburg Virus: US Issues Warning, Saudi, Oman Impose Travel Restrictions as Outbreak Kills 9 in Africa - News18
articles.description: The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is urging travellers to Guinea and Tanzania to be mindful of contracting the deadly Marburg virus
articles.content:
The Marburg virus, which has claimed nine deaths, is spreading across countries in Africa raising concerns around the globe.
